result.markdown: --- title: "Ben Messerly" image: "images/messerly_profile.png" execute: echo: false message: false warning: false about: template: trestles links: - icon: linkedin href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ben-messerly/ - icon: github href: https://github.com/bamesserly - text: '' href: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1388-8737 --- ::: {.cell} ::: ### Welcome to my personal website! My research is in high energy particle physics with focuses on both detector construction and data analysis. Some of my recent work includes building the electron tracking detector for the Mu2e experiment, designing and building a systematics software toolkit for general particle physics analyses, and measuring neutrino interactions at Fermilab. I'm interested undergraduate physics education, and I was recently a visiting professor at [St. Olaf](https://wp.stolaf.edu/physics/) and [Carleton](https://www.carleton.edu/physics-astronomy/).
